name: cup-updates
tagline: A self-hosted pastebin service with syntax highlighting and expiring pastes
description: Cup is a lightweight, self-hosted online pastebin service that supports syntax highlighting and temporary or permanent pastes. It focuses on simplicity, privacy, and a clean UI for sharing code or text snippets via a web interface.

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Create self-destructing snippets for privacy. Share securely

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Keep important pastes available long-term. Flexible retention

features.title: Clean Interface
features.description: Minimalist design focused on content. No distractions

features.title: Privacy
features.description: No tracking or unnecessary data collection. Your pastes stay private

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run your own pastebin service. Complete ownership and control
